summary: This document contains details from a Dow Jones alert regarding Jeffrey Epstein, including his identification as a Special Interest Person (SIP) and mentions his involvement in a settled civil fraud action related to insider trading. The document also references a case involving multiple individuals charged by the SEC.

events.title: SEC Charges in Insider Trading Case
events.description: The SEC filed a settled civil fraud action against Allen M. Glick and associates, including Epstein, for illegal insider trading.

keyFacts: Jeffrey S. Epstein is identified as a Special Interest Person in a Dow Jones alert.
Epstein was involved in a settled civil fraud action related to insider trading.
The SEC charged Epstein along with Allen M. Glick and others for illegal insider trading.
The defendants agreed to pay over $437,000 in disgorgement and penalties.
The document includes a reference to the SEC litigation release number 18675.
